name: Notion Invoice Template
description: Streamline your invoicing process and get paid faster with this Notion invoice template!Tired of manually creating and tracking invoices? This Notion invoice template makes it easy and efficient to generate professional invoices, send them to clients, and track their status and payments.Template InclusionSimple fillable template to quickly share with clientsContains fillable Payment Info and Payment Terms and Condition Section to make changes to suite your preferencesExportable and shareable as
features: Simple fillable template to quickly share with clients; Contains fillable Payment Info and Payment Terms and Condition Section to make changes to suite your preferences; Exportable and shareable as PDF.
